# Schedler.pro | Alexander Schedler: Internet application engineering, development and management.

## Overview
[Schedler.pro](https://schedler.pro/): This site serves as a professional portfolio for Alexander Schedler, showcasing expertise in internet application engineering, development, and management. It provides insights into his skills, projects, and professional background.

## Curriculum Vitae (CV)
[Curriculum vitae (CV)](https://schedler.pro/): This section contains the detailed professional history of Alexander Schedler, outlining his qualifications, work experience, and contributions to the field of internet application engineering. It serves as a comprehensive resource for understanding his career trajectory and technical proficiencies.
